00260 /*
00261  * Used to create and add one or more MonitoredItems to a Subscription. A
00262  * MonitoredItem is deleted automatically by the Server when the Subscription is
00263  * deleted. Deleting a MonitoredItem causes its entire set of triggered item
00264  * links to be deleted, but has no effect on the MonitoredItems referenced by
00265  * the triggered items.
00266  */
00267 void Service_CreateMonitoredItems(UA_Server *server, UA_Session *session,
00268                                        const UA_CreateMonitoredItemsRequest *request, 
00269                                        UA_CreateMonitoredItemsResponse *response);
